::The Galactors::

The Scrap/Flare jet manages to spin out of the way of two shots, but 
the third one hits the top of it, leaving a nasty dent. The jet's 
repair system activates, working on the dent as the jet circles back, 
firing two more missiles at Astroblast.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Vicyr/Slasys jet, still cloaked, turns around and fires three 
more plasma shots at Astroblast.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Astroblasts radar picks up the missiles heading toward him, but 
> not soon enough to dodge both of them. The first missile 
> broadsides him, but he manages to dodge the second. Then 
> coming around he fires three laser blasts from his twin laser 
> cannons at Scrap. "Trying to surprise me are you, I don't think 
so!" 
> he says evily.
